Package DataAccessLayer

Class AbstractDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
DataAccessLayer.AbstractDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - - the type on which the operations will be performed
Direct Known Subclasses:
OrderDAO, OrderSumDAO, PersonDAO, ProductDAO
public class AbstractDAO<T>
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract Class to generate CRUD operations for working with database.
Author:
Has Darius

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AbstractDAO()
    Instantiates a new Abstract dao.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Integer delete​(int id)
    It is a generic method that deletes an object from a table that it corresponds to from the database.
    java.util.List<T> findAll()
    It is a generic method that accesses the database and finds all objects from a table.
    T findById​(int id)
    Generic method to find an object from a table using the ID field.
    java.lang.Integer insert​(T t)
    It is a generic method that inserts a new object into a table that it corresponds to from the database.
    java.lang.Integer update​(java.lang.String whatToUpdate, int id, java.lang.Object value)
    It is a generic method that updates an object into that it corresponds to from the database.

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractDAO

      public AbstractDAO()
      Instantiates a new Abstract dao.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      public java.util.List<T> findAll()
      It is a generic method that accesses the database and finds all objects from a table.
      Returns:
      a list of all objects from a table in the database.

    • findById

      public T findById​(int id)
      Generic method to find an object from a table using the ID field. The Object with the ID corresponding to the value of the parameter will be searched.
      Parameters:
      id - the id
      Returns:
      the object from a table in the database that has the id field corresponding to the value of the parameter.

    • insert

      public java.lang.Integer insert​(T t)
      It is a generic method that inserts a new object into a table that it corresponds to from the database.
      Parameters:
      t - the t
      Returns:
      number of rows affected by the operation.

    • delete

      public java.lang.Integer delete​(int id)
      It is a generic method that deletes an object from a table that it corresponds to from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the id
      Returns:
      number of rows affected by the operation.

    • update

      public java.lang.Integer update​(java.lang.String whatToUpdate, int id, java.lang.Object value)
      It is a generic method that updates an object into that it corresponds to from the database. The whatToUpdate parameters indicates the field that will be updated and the value indicates the new value.
      Parameters:
      whatToUpdate - the what to update
      id - the id
      value - the value
      Returns:
      number of rows affected by the operation.
